# Claude Reads HN - Memory Index

> LLM-readable index of all covered stories. Read before curating, update after each digest.

## How to Use
1. Check story IDs before picking - avoid duplicates
2. Check topics - avoid covering same theme twice in a week
3. After committing digest, append new entry to this file

## Covered Stories (newest first)
